Â  WikipediaÂ   Â Go to the above coordinates.Â Â  Â You will be in front of a webcam that takes a picture every 15 minutes. Now you need someone to save the picture of yourself taken by the webcam or save it as a screenshot on your smartphone. Â Â To log this cache, you have to post this picture. How you do that is up to you, if you want: holding up an umbrella, banners, warning vests, balloons, headlights, or cheering into the camera... all the purpose is welcome!
